data.title: Fill dirt - fill material - soil with minimal debris
data.description:
We have fill dirt with minimal debris available for pick up. Depending on quantity and location we can deliver. 
We have a loader onsite and will load your trucks. 
Please call for the address we are located in Wixom.

data.title: Free fill dirt - DELIVERED
data.description:
I have about 20 yards of fill dirt. Will deliver within 10 miles of St Clair Shores. I will deliver as little as 3 yards. please call or text I do not check my email often. 
Steve ***
